description:
The captain of the Phoenix Pirates loses his will to fight, and the Straw Hats get trapped in a field of icebergs by some figure skating bounty hunters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinsekai ni Shizumu Yume! Shitsui no Kaizoku Puzzle
The Dream Sinking in the New World! The Disillusioned Pirate, Puzzle
Un rêve englouti par le Nouveau Monde ! Puzzle, un pirate désespéré
Разбившаяся мечта о Новом Мире. Отчаявшийся пират Пазул
الحلم الغارق في العالم الجديد! القرصان المخذول بازل
新世界に沈む夢! 失意の海賊パズール
